oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Chavannes Journal
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Madame Adrian Chavannes
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Emma Sanford Robinson, Barbara Adair McClung
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Chavannes Journal. Copied by Barbara Adair McClung, Knoxville, Tenn. 1930. JOURNAL. Written by Madame Adrian Chavannes. (Anna Fanny Albertine Charlotte Chavannes Francillon) During Her Journey To America In 1848, And Sent By Her To Her Friend Madame De La Harpe De Loes, Lausanne, Switzerland. Translated from the original french by her grand-daughter, Emma Sanford Robinson.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Diaries; Memoirs; Swiss Americans;
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Cataloged book collection in the C.M. McClung Historical Collection
